oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Nashville Bridge Company barge launching on the Cumberland River, 1951 August
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An August 1957 launching of a barge onto the Cumberland River, next to the Nashville Bridge Company. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 2 photograph negatives : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Nashville Bridge Company
